[ syll. ma-kya, mak-ya ] The baby girl name Makya is pronounced as M EY KYAH †. Makya has its origins in the Native American language. The meaning of Makya is 'a huntress of eagles'. Baby names that sound like Makya include Makyah, Maaja, Maasai, Maca, Macee, Macey (English), Macha, Machey, Machi (Japanese), Machie, Machy, Maci (English), Macie (English), Mackey (English), Mackie (English), Macy (English), Maecee, Maecey, Maeci, and Maecie.
